mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.age, u.height, u.weight, u.bmi, u.pbw, u.serialNum, u.medicalRecord, u.diagnose, u.doctor, u.card, u.homeAddres FROM sys_padient u
AND u.name LIKE concat('%',#{username},'%')
ORDER BY u.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_padient ( name, age, height, weight, bmi, pbw, serialNum, medicalRecord, diagnose, doctor, card, homeAddres ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{age}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, #{pbw}, #{serialNum}, #{medicalRecord}, #{diagnose}, #{doctor}, #{card}, #{homeAddres} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.age, u.height, u.weight, u.bmi, u.pbw, u.serialNum, u.medicalRecord, u.diagnose, u.doctor, u.card, u.homeAddres FROM sys_padient u WHERE u.id = #{id}
